评论详情: Looks so elegant and the color is beautiful

I wore this dress to my baby shower. I was 32 weeks pregnant at the time. I sized up (obviously) but was comfy with plenty of room. The material of the dress was great. Flowy- not too tight around the belly. The color was exactly as described and not see through.
I always get tons of compliments on this dress! Comfortable,  good quality, would buy again in a different color.

评论概述: One of my favorite dresses on Amazon
评论详情: Bought a medium size and it wears perfect! I like the quality and the softness of the dress. I gained weight and I was looking for something not too tight and this is perfect!

Very flattering dress. True to size. Arrived very wrinkled so I recommend washing it and steaming it before use.

The design is cute but they cut every corner they could with constructing this. The fit is odd, the material is cheap, and the midriff/back isn’t lined, leaving an obvious color difference when the dress is worn. The material is thin enough that you need to be very careful about what you wear under it. Obviously I kept and wore the dress, but looking back at the photos, it was not the most flattering. It is pretty comfy though!

评论概述: Very big, size down. Poor quality fabric
评论详情: Not meant for flatter chested girls. The fabric doesn’t hug the top at all it was quite baggy. I typically wear medium so that’s what I ordered and it was too large. Also even after ironing and steaming I was not able to get some of the creases out that were there from how it shipped.

It is sewn the same as the picture but nothing of the same material. It is as if someone took a cheap bed sheet and tried to sew it in the same pattern. If it is a high school home-ec project then it is awesome, but it is not worth this much! The hell?
The dress is not like picture the seam is showing at waist looks weird
I love the dress 👗 beautiful color , nice material … perfect to show up nice shoulders !!! And the bow in the back .. is chic
Length was great! Great price, comfortable for the occasion.
It’s ok, not sure if I like it yet. I like the style but it’s a little long. The fabric feels ok not too bad, it’s light and comfortable.

Really wanted this dress to work it's so beautiful. I'm a 36 JJ, the shoulders/arms do not stay in place they are too loose, there's too much room in the chest area which is a first for me, and though I am a true XL this dress is too tight in the stomach. If I were to eat I would not be able to sit. Unfortunately because the top is so large I cannot size up and I will have to return this dress.

I ordered several dresses to wear to wedding this summer. This is a total winner, the wrap detail on the waist is perfect for making a fantastic shape. Moving the straps from on to off the shoulder changes the look of the dress so you can wear it to different types of events.
Off the shoulder or up on - so so cute! Very comfortable and flattering. Great length for 5’3”.

I was hesitant on this dress since there weren’t many reviews or pictures , But this dress is BEAUTIFUL!! It looks soooo classy , i ordered two dresses i have coming up for a September wedding and i decided to go with this one. It’s a silky material, Has an extra layer under the dress so it is not see thru. It’s perfect the length everything about the dress! I got a size large and I am 160 pounds , 5”6 and it goes to my ankles. Can not wait to wear this in September. Get it!
Dress is cute and material is light and comfortable. Only bad thing is the zipper. It’s a thin cheap quality. If you purchase this dress go change the zipper immediately before using.

I love this dress. Each time I wear it, I get so many compliments. It feels good wearing against my skin. I feel confident wearing it as it's cute and modest. With the strap to tie in the back, it makes the dress look very flattering on anyone. You can wear the dress off the shoulder or over the shoulder for a more modest look. I even paired it with a shawl on a cool evening.
This is a really cute dress.
Not the best material for a dress to heavy
Like but might need to exchange for different size! What size did I order? Need a XL

评论概述: Great material, but has a country vibe
评论详情: The fabric and lining is quality for a wedding guest dress. But the puff sleeves with ruffle, and gathered chest it has a very country look to it. I didn't like the middle seem that ran around the entire middle, it cheapened it, for my taste. It runs big on top.
Kinda of tight around bust area.  Cute dress though

评论概述: Be sure to check the sizing!
评论详情: I originally bought the dress in two different colors (green and red) and was so happy with how they fit and how it looked. Sizing can be difficult for me because I always have to size up with a bigger chest, but it looks too baggy everywhere else, but it wasn’t the case with this dress. For reference, I’m usually in between a L/XL, depending on the chest elasticity.  The girls were lifted, waist snatched, and the option of on or off the shoulder was really nice. I felt really beautiful in it. Last minute, I decided to return it to get a black dress.  The black dress came 2 days before the wedding and I was so upset that they sent the wrong size. I almost didn’t check since I knew how well the fit/look of it was. I ended up panic ordering for my actual size but with the time crunch, I didn’t even get to wear it and had to buy another dress in person. Really bummed about not only not being able to wear it for the wedding, but the fact that the order sizing was correct, the label on the bag was correct, but a different size was in it.  Because I didn’t even get the chance to wear it and of the mishap, I’ll have to give this a 2 star. But if everything panned out, I’d definitely give it a higher rating.
Love this dress

This dress deserves more stars. I don’t understand people complaining of cheap quality. It feels comfortable and great. The first night I accidentally got it dirty with butter cream, I was afraid I ruined it. I washed it and looks brand new. The material actually made it easy for the butter cream to come off on a wash cycle. I got compliments on my dress! The red really popped!
I received this dress with no tags.  It smelled horrifically of body odor
Dress is perfect to size, material was soft and over all, it was a perfect dress !!
Came with stains and snags. Had to return.

The picture is gorgeous. I would say that the dress is the same style and length as pictured. The fabric was cheaper than expected. It also fit well and I like how it lays over the stomach. However I could not zip it in the back as I have a bigger bust. I do not think this is a good dress for girls with a bigger chest, however for the right girl and occasion it could be perfect!
Dress material is very thin and sheet like.

This is the 5th time I’ve bought a dress or romper from this brand, and it never fails!! I bought this dress for a semi-formal wedding and it’s a great length, not too long but not too short! The chest has plenty of space and is stretchy so it can work for a range of sizes. I’m a 40DDD so normally I have issues finding the right fit. It’s a beautiful color too!! Highly recommend this style!!
Dress was cute but the quality felt cheap

This dress came with no tag and was extremely wrinkled. I tried it on and it’s totally see through. The material is thin and feels very cheap - think Halloween costume from Target/Walmart. The cut and fit are also not as shown in the photo. The material it’s made out of would never lay or flow the way it does in the photo. Also, the cut and design of the dress is slightly off. My guess is this brand is trying to “dupe” the dress shown in the photo - or at least that’s what it felt like.
The dress had a pink spot right in the chest area and had some dark spots on the bottom of the dress
super super cute but didn’t keep because it slightly hugged my stomach. such a romantic vibe tho
Great quality. Flattering! true to size I’d say,  no stretch on bottom but it’s very flowy bottom which is great for hips and bum.

Cheap fabric that makes you look like your wrapped in a curtain from grandmas house. Save yourself some time and money and just buy something else. You could probably eeny meeny miney moe it and end up with a dress of better quality than this one.
size was big

The color and the dress in general is beautiful I love it.I also loved the material it’s perfect for hot weather. The only thing I would say I was bothered by was the chest area ,it’s a big and looks like I have HUGE boobs and I personally didn’t like it.

This dress fit perfect. I weigh 140 pounds and ordered a medium. That is my normal size. It didn’t look baggy but also wasn’t too tight. I ordered the light orange color. The color matched the picture perfectly. I want this dress is multiple colors.

Used this as my civil wedding dress and it was perfect, true to size🤍 im 5’7 and 205 pounds, it was the perfect fit! Not see through at all and it was super comfy! It was wrinkled in the packaging but it steamed really fast & really well!(: Satisfied with my purchase!

I love it! I wore it to a wedding and it fir perfectly!
Honestly best purchase I’ve made. I’m absolutely in love with this dress.
This dress was perfect for dressing up and Halloween!!
Got this dress for my teenage daughter, she loves it! Was impressed with the fit and  look.
I bought this dress to wear for my wedding and it was better than expected. Very comfortable, elegant and fit perfectly. Not too long but flattering, even as a short girl (5'2). Would recommend.

评论概述: Eh. Pretty color, not thrilled with quality.

I thought it was because I am small on top, but even stuffing my bra to max capacity didn't help with the saggy appearance from the side. 😕 Really wanted to wear this for my anniversary tomorrow, but will unfortunately be returning.
I got this to be Wendy from Peter Pan.  Great dress, after I steamed it before wearing and when we got home, it still wasn't wrinkled! Fit true to size and comfy, color true to picture.

Nice material and colors.  Washed up well too.  Fabric is very flattering but I would say if you are overweight or have cellulite on your back side I don’t think it would be. In my opinion if you have an athletic, tall, thin or hourglass shape this will look great on you

I love this dress. It fit just right and looked super cute. The material was decent definitely not the most high end and there wasn’t much stretch to it. The thing that I didn’t like was the elastic on the sleeves it was cheap and costume looking. But you couldn’t see it while wearing it so that was ok. The seams were just ok, they did look they had potential to unravel so washing I will be very careful. Overall is an inexpensive option for a last minute dress.
The fabric was thin.  Be mindful of your undergarments.  There is also a waist seam that doesn’t sit right on me

I am absolutely in love with this dress. There is no stretch to it. I got an XL when I usually wear a large after reading the reviews and I’m glad I did. It was a little tight getting it on but once it’s on it fits like a glove.

Wore this for my engagement party! The fit was perfect and it was so comfortable. Not see through at all. Only thing that could have been better is the lighter lining on the midriff but other than that it’s great!
Loved the color and fit. The tie back to ion is already fraying when I had not worn it. Also the zipper broke after one day. Def disappointed. I’d hoped to get more than one wear out of this dress.

评论概述: Flattering and cute , but cheap material and poorly made
评论详情: The cut is flattering, the design with the bow in the back is cute and the color is beautiful and vibrant, HOWEVER this is sadly very cheaply and poorly made which is why I had to return it. As with many of these cheaply mass produced items of clothing, the dress I got is not entirely symmetrical, more specifically, one half of the sweetheart neckline is higher up and uneven which makes it look cheap and somewhat off. I tried to even this out by ironing and steaming it gently, but it didn't help since the fabric seems to just have been cut unevenly and asymmetrically. Moreover, the material holds the wrinkles/folds from the packaging and there is a big, horizontal fold across the bust area which you can see in my picture as well as many pictures by other customers.

Love this dress! I wore it to a summer wedding and got so many compliments. The fabric was light and the length was perfect. The puff sleeves covered the part of my arms that I'm a little self conscious of, which was the reason I purchased this dress. Returned an expensive dress for this one and I am glad I did!
It was very light in texture and it was very see through

评论概述: Only Fits Skinner and Taller Women
评论详情: This dress has very thin material, and if you are an average sized to larger sized woman it won't fir nearly as cleanly as it fits the model. I'm 5'3 and an average curvier size, I ordered a medium. the torso of the dress is too long to be flattering, and won't fit over my hips for me to pull it down and adjust it. The back of the dress was too loose though, so a size up would not have fit properly either.
very flattering cottage core vibe dress. does not show sweat at all, which i was very surprised by. but bad quality and wouldn't last for more than a few washes
